Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class IzQuery

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.IzQuery
public class IzQuery extends Object
A structure to manage query parameters.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

  • Constructor Details

    • IzQuery

      public IzQuery(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v251.segment.QPD qpd) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Create a new Query for an Immunization or ImmunizationRecommendation
      Parameters:
      qpd - The QPD to create
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception

  • Method Details

    • addParameter

      public void addParameter(String fhirParamName, List<String> params) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Add a given search parameter to the QPD segment.
      Parameters:
      fhirParamName - The FHIR parameter name
      params - The list of parameters.
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If an error occurs.

    • update

      public void update() throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Finalize some the parameters and then check for a valid query
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - Should an error occur during parsing of HL7 content
